thread.title: Awesome place, totally value for money.
thread.title_full: Awesome place, totally value for money. - Review of Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: esmailbeguwala
title: Awesome place, totally value for money.
text: I visited London for New year 2017 and stayed here for 5 days in Jan, back then it was operating under the brand name of Tune hotels. My stay was extremely comfortable, especially thanks to Nurun at the front desk who went out of her way to ensure that everything was in order and my check in and check out along with the stay was better than I would have asked for.
